description.english: Defeat puny kobolds.
Defeat a kobold ambush.
Defeat the protectors of the abandoned temple.
Defeat the dark skeleton.
Retrieve the Golden Candelabra.
Save Morning Dewdrop from the elementals.
Defeat the protectors of the old manor.
Survive a dangerous night.
Defeat the dark shaman.
Open the gate with superior locks.
Save Morning Dewdrop's sister.
Defeat the squad that teleported in.
Protect the walls of Dawnsbury.
Protect the Golden Candelabra.
Defeat the demon in the town sewers.
Protect and retrieve the prismatic key.
Survive an ambush on the open seas.
Protect merfolk children from an attack.
Defeat the remaining dark poets.
Clear the skies of Dawnsbury.
Double-kill the demon lord and save Dawnsbury.

Win all encounters in the "Additional scenarios" encounter group. You must do this at the expected level without exceeding expected party wealth. You don't need to win the "Training Grounds" encounter.
Win all encounters of the main adventure path on Hard difficulty or above.
Win all encounters of the main adventure path on Insane difficulty.
Kill an enemy with a critical hit.
Deal at least 50 damage to a single creature with a single combat action.
Score a hit 10 times because of a +1 circumstance or status bonus.
Deal extra damage because of a creature's weakness
Kill three or more creatures using a single spell.
Cast a spell of 3rd level or higher.
Make a Strike with a +1 weapon.
Make a Strike with a +1 striking weapon.
Defeat 80 enemy creatures.
Cause an enemy creature to suffer from 3 different debuffs at the same time.

displayName.english: Wait a moment while I get ready...

description.english: Have 3 buffs on a single hero at the same time.
Grapple an enemy creature.
Win an encounter with four characters of the same class.
Win an encounter without casting spells or making Strikes.
Win the whole Dawnsbury Days adventure up to the end of character level 4 without ever buying an item from the shop (not even during character creation).
Have all four heroes be Undetected at the same time.
Enter a rage.
Score a critical hit on a roll where you know that you will score a crit with 100% chance beforehand (e.g. because of Devise a Stratagem).
Inflict positive damage on an undead with Heal.
Make an attack of opportunity.
Command an animal companion.
Activate a blood magic effect.
Drain bonded item to regain a spell slot.
Re-engage your kinetic aura mid-combat.
Inflict sneak attack damage.
Unleash your psyche.
Make a Spellstrike.
Perform a flurry of blows.
Cast a composition spell.
Take a champion's reaction.
Cast Wild Shape.
Increase the level of your oracular curse to moderate.
Enter an encounter with one character wearing at least 6 worn magic items.
Etch a rune onto a weapon or onto armor.
Grapple an enemy creature 10 times.
Defeat the gnolls in the Hotel of Serenity. (You must do this at level 5 without exceeding expected party wealth.)
Defeat the lich in his lair.  (You must do this at level 8 without exceeding expected party wealth.)
Answer the sphinx's riddle correctly.
In the same Swamp encounter, consecrate the shrine, open and loot all four chests, fully heal the leshy, and win.
In the same Council encounter, earn the votes of Ramielle and Cassiel, and earn the respect of Seraphiel and Baraquielle.
Steal from all four alcoves in the Heavenly Vault.

displayName.english: Ultimate disappearance of the Inevitable Death

description.english: Drain all eight Aspects of Inevitability before the Profane Barrier collapses, then win the encounter.

Interrupt a lich or an aeon-lich while they're still prebuffing.
Disable a Statue of Heal or a Statue of Harm.
Protect the children of Dawnsbury.
Make your way towards the hag coven.
Defeat the will-o'-wisp.

Defeat the demons guarding the fortress.
Defeat the mummy and the construct.
Defeat the succubus.
Defeat the oozes and the skeleton.
Defeat the prismatic polyhedron.
Defeat the demons guarding the Profane Barrier.
Gain entrance to the control center.
Defeat the aeon-lich.
Recruit help from a fallen angel.
Defeat the Leng spider.
Planeshift to Heaven.
Defeat the nyogoth.
Argue your case before the council of archangels.
Enjoy a moment's rest in the chambers of Heaven.
Defeat an archangel.
Steal the Tiara of Open Skies from Heaven.
Expose the dark creatures infiltrating Heaven.
Defeat the vrock.
Defeat the undead wizards.
Seize research on the Great Axiomatic Barrier.
Defeat a second demon lord.
Collapse the Profane Barrier.
Win all encounters of the Profane Barrier expansion.
Win all encounters of the Profane Barrier expansion on Hard or Insane difficulty.
Win all encounters of the Profane Barrier expansion on Insane difficulty.
Steal only the Tiara from the Heavenly Vault.
Defeat the specters.
Ascend to the upper level of the orphanage.
Descend back from the upper level of the orphanage.
Deal an old adventuring party a second defeat.
Destroy Grandmother Demay for good.

Free Talia from the shadow demon's control without killing her.
Trigger all three flashbacks related to the Tarnak children.
Open a secret door that leads to the hidden wing.
